channel.title: Comments on: Adding ‘More…’ To Your WordPress Entries

item.title: By: Alexandar Tzanov
item.dc:creator: Alexandar Tzanov
item.description: Cool dude. I was trying to figure out how to use her plug in, and read your comment. I like the Word Press way of doing this better. In addition I have to use one less plug in, which I am happy about. Thanks. I guess I should read the docs first next time. :)
item.content:encoded: Cool dude. I was trying to figure out how to use her plug in, and read your comment. I like the Word Press way of doing this better. In addition I have to use one less plug in, which I am happy about. Thanks. I guess I should read the docs first next time. ðŸ™‚
